name: Solar Wind (itch) (~Kai_Bubble~)
description:
Fly your balloon above the gem infested seas of the sun. Graze the surface of a solar core and harvest the boundless energies!

Left click to blow wind towards your balloon. Get near obstacles to graze them giving you points and raising your multiplier. Stay near a grazed obstacle to continue getting points and sustain your multiplier. Go too long without grazing and your multiplier will start to fall.

In challenge mode you also need to keep the cursor from touching obstacles.
